Name: Anime And Your Life
About the game: Anime And Your Life This is a creative interpretation of reality. This is a simulation of the operating system with its own rules. Here you will find many different 'useful' and 'entertaining' applications. Accept yourself, build yourself, accept reality, build your reality. Main features: Cute 2D tyan assistant! Aggressive geopolitical card game. Fight with your charming assistant in an exciting card game! Customization for your assistant! Large selection of all types of clothing and hairstyles! Message Encryptor for safe and interesting communication with friends! Browser, a full-fledged browser built into the game, for more convenient use of the Internet without being distracted from the game! Planet, a whole planet where you can place various buildings that will affect the gameplay! Music, 35 musical compositions that will not leave anyone indifferent!
